marker.ph:
<<DockPanel Margin="10"> <Ribbon HorizontalContentAlignment="Stretch" VerticalContentAlignment="Stretch" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Margin="-11,-34,-11,-5"> <RibbonTab Header="Volksfest"> <RibbonGroup Header="File System"> <RibbonButton x:Name="Laden" Label="Laden" Click="Load" /> <RibbonButton x:Name="Speichern" Label="Speichern" Click="Save" /> </RibbonGroup> <RibbonGroup Header="Mitarbeiter - System"> <RibbonButton Label="Übernehmen" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}"/> </RibbonGroup> </RibbonTab> </Ribbon> <Grid>
<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TabControl Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="7" Grid.RowSpan="4" Grid.Row="0" x:Name="Fest" Margin="10">
<TabItem Header="Mitarbeiter">
<dxg:GridControl x:Name="Grid" VerticalAlignment="Top" AutoGenerateColumns="AddNew" EnableSmartColumnsGeneration="True" Height="280" Margin="0" >
<dxg:GridControl.View > <dxg:TableView AutoWidth="True" NewItemRowPosition="Bottom" ShowGroupFooters="true" AllowPerPixelScrolling="True" ShowTotalSummary="True"> <dxg:TableView.FormatConditions> <dxg:ColorScaleFormatCondition ApplyToRow="True" FieldName="Team" MaxValue="10" MinValue="0"> <dx:ColorScaleFormat ColorMin="##FFF8696B" ColorMax="##FF63BE7B" ColorMiddle="##FFFFEB84"/> </dxg:ColorScaleFormatCondition> </dxg:TableView.FormatConditions> </dxg:TableView>
</dxg:GridControl.View>
<dxg:GridColumn FieldName="ID" Header="Personalnummer"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Vorname" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Nachname" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Telefonnumer" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Tage" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="ErstesJahr" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="AnzahlJahre"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Team"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="DiesesJahr"> <dxg:GridColumn.DisplayTemplate> <ControlTemplate> <dxe:CheckEdit EditMode="InplaceInactive" IsChecked="{Binding EditValue, RelativeSource={RelativeSource Mode=TemplatedParent}}" IsEnabled="{Binding DataContext.RowData.Row.IsChecked, Mode=OneTime}"/> </ControlTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn.DisplayTemplate> <dxg:GridColumn.EditTemplate> <ControlTemplate> <dxe:CheckEdit x:Name="PART_Editor" EditMode="InplaceActive" IsChecked="{Binding EditValue, Mode=TwoWay, RelativeSource={RelativeSource Mode=TemplatedParent}, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding DataContext.RowData.Row.IsChecked, Mode=OneTime}"/> </ControlTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn.EditTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn>
</dxg:GridControl> </TabItem> <TabItem Header="Planung" > <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition Height="10*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="0.5*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBlock Text="Anzahl der Arbeiter" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBox Margin="1" Name="Anzahl" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="1" Grid.Column="0" MinWidth="50" MaxWidth="50" /> <Button Content="Mitarbeiter übernehmen" Grid.Column="1" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}" HorizontalAlignment="Right" MaxHeight="25" MaxWidth="170" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <!-- Grid Planung --> <dxg:GridControl Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Grid.Row="1" AutoGenerateColumns="AddNew" EnableSmartColumnsGeneration="True"> <dxg:GridControl.View> <dxg:TableView AllowPerPixelScrolling="True" ShowTotalSummary="True"/> </dxg:GridControl.View> </dxg:GridControl> </Grid> </TabItem>
<!-- __________________________________________________Anzahl Arbeiter__________________________________________________ -->
</TabControl> </Grid> <!--<dxg:GridControl AutoGenerateColumns="AddNew" EnableSmartColumnsGeneration="True"> <dxg:GridControl.View> <dxg:TableView AllowPerPixelScrolling="True" ShowTotalSummary="True"/> </dxg:GridControl.View> </dxg:GridControl>--> </DockPanel>.../>

<<Ribbon HorizontalContentAlignment="Stretch" VerticalContentAlignment="Stretch" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Margin="-11,-34,-11,-5"> <RibbonTab Header="Volksfest"> <RibbonGroup Header="File System"> <RibbonButton x:Name="Laden" Label="Laden" Click="Load" /> <RibbonButton x:Name="Speichern" Label="Speichern" Click="Save" /> </RibbonGroup> <RibbonGroup Header="Mitarbeiter - System"> <RibbonButton Label="Übernehmen" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}"/> </RibbonGroup> </RibbonTab> </Ribbon> <Grid>
<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TabControl Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="7" Grid.RowSpan="4" Grid.Row="0" x:Name="Fest" Margin="10">
<TabItem Header="Mitarbeiter">

</dxg:GridControl.View>
<dxg:GridColumn FieldName="ID" Header="Personalnummer"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Vorname" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Nachname" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Telefonnumer" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Tage" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="ErstesJahr" /> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="AnzahlJahre"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="Team"/> <dxg:GridColumn FieldName="DiesesJahr"> <dxg:GridColumn.DisplayTemplate> <ControlTemplate> <dxe:CheckEdit EditMode="InplaceInactive" IsChecked="{Binding EditValue, RelativeSource={RelativeSource Mode=TemplatedParent}}" IsEnabled="{Binding DataContext.RowData.Row.IsChecked, Mode=OneTime}"/> </ControlTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn.DisplayTemplate> <dxg:GridColumn.EditTemplate> <ControlTemplate> <dxe:CheckEdit x:Name="PART_Editor" EditMode="InplaceActive" IsChecked="{Binding EditValue, Mode=TwoWay, RelativeSource={RelativeSource Mode=TemplatedParent}, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding DataContext.RowData.Row.IsChecked, Mode=OneTime}"/> </ControlTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn.EditTemplate> </dxg:GridColumn>
</dxg:GridControl> </TabItem> <TabItem Header="Planung" > <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition Height="10*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="0.5*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBlock Text="Anzahl der Arbeiter" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBox Margin="1" Name="Anzahl" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="1" Grid.Column="0" MinWidth="50" MaxWidth="50" /> <Button Content="Mitarbeiter übernehmen" Grid.Column="1" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}" HorizontalAlignment="Right" MaxHeight="25" MaxWidth="170" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <!-- Grid Planung --> <dxg:GridControl Grid.ColumnSpan="3" Grid.Row="1" AutoGenerateColumns="AddNew" EnableSmartColumnsGeneration="True"> <dxg:GridControl.View> <dxg:TableView AllowPerPixelScrolling="True" ShowTotalSummary="True"/> </dxg:GridControl.View> </dxg:GridControl> </Grid> </TabItem>
<!-- __________________________________________________Anzahl Arbeiter__________________________________________________ -->
</TabControl> </Grid>.../>

<<RibbonTab Header="Volksfest"> <RibbonGroup Header="File System"> <RibbonButton x:Name="Laden" Label="Laden" Click="Load" /> <RibbonButton x:Name="Speichern" Label="Speichern" Click="Save" /> </RibbonGroup> <RibbonGroup Header="Mitarbeiter - System"> <RibbonButton Label="Übernehmen" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}"/> </RibbonGroup> </RibbonTab>.../>

<<DockPanel Margin="10"> <Ribbon HorizontalContentAlignment="Stretch" VerticalContentAlignment="Stretch" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Margin="-11,-34,-11,-5"> <RibbonTab Header="Volksfest"> <RibbonGroup Header="File System"> <RibbonButton x:Name="Laden" Label="Laden" Click="Load" /> <RibbonButton x:Name="Speichern" Label="Speichern" Click="Save" /> </RibbonGroup> <RibbonGroup Header="Mitarbeiter - System"> <RibbonButton Label="Übernehmen" Click="Button_Click" IsEnabled="{Binding Loaded}"/> </RibbonGroup> </RibbonTab> </Ribbon> <Grid>

<TabControl Grid.Column="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="7" Grid.RowSpan="4" Grid.Row="0" x:Name="Fest" Margin="10">
<TabItem Header="Mitarbeiter">
<dxg:GridControl x:Name="Grid" VerticalAlignment="Top" AutoGenerateColumns="AddNew" EnableSmartColumnsGeneration="True" Height="280" Margin="0" >
<dxg:GridControl.View > <dxg:TableView AutoWidth="True" NewItemRowPosition="Bottom" ShowGroupFooters="true" AllowPerPixelScrolling="True" ShowTotalSummary="True"> <dxg:TableView.FormatConditions> <dxg:ColorScaleFormatCondition ApplyToRow="True" FieldName="Team" MaxValue="10" MinValue="0"> <dx:ColorScaleFormat ColorMin="##FFF8696B" ColorMax="##FF63BE7B" ColorMiddle="##FFFFEB84"/> </dxg:ColorScaleFormatCondition> </dxg:TableView.FormatConditions> </dxg:TableView>
